title: GPT-5.2-Codex Available in Additional IDEs
description: GitHub announced that GPT-5.2-Codex is now available in Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse.

title: Commit Message and Codemaps Bug Fixes
description: Windsurf version 1.13.13 includes fixes for commit message generation and codemaps suggestions.

title: App Store for Agents and Open Source Library
description: Massive update introducing an App Store for agents with 100+ pre-made agents and skills. New task system highlighted as 'soooo good' and 'total game changer for multi-agent work.' Agent swarms announced as coming soon.

community_feedback.quote: There's a breaking bug in version 2.1.0 released on January 7, 2026. The issue is related to semver format problems with the date suffix.
User discovered Claude Code defaulted to Opus, causing high token consumption on Claude Max plan.

title: Version 0.90.0 with Network Sandbox Proxy
description: OpenAI released Codex CLI v0.90.0 featuring a major network sandbox proxy with policy enforcement to control outbound network access, along with MCP integration and performance improvements.

title: Enterprise Command Auto-Execution Management
description: Enterprise admins can now specify organization-wide allow and deny lists for command auto-execution, along with bug fixes and performance improvements for diff zones.

title: Preview Release v0.26.0-preview.0
description: Google released Gemini CLI v0.26.0-preview.0 with experimental features including improved hooks for running custom scripts at different CLI lifecycle events.

title: January 2026 Platform Update
description: Devin released minor bug fixes and performance improvements across the platform, including Devin Review feature updates.

title: CLI Agent Modes and Cloud Handoff
description: Cursor released a significant CLI update featuring Plan mode for designing approaches before coding, Ask mode for exploring code without changes, and Cloud Handoff for background cloud agent processing.

community_feedback.quote: When it comes to diffs (edits), Cursor is batch-oriented, while CC suggests one edit at a time and can be steered in real time.

title: Windows Group Policy Support
description: Admins can now manage Windsurf restrictions via Windows Group Policy, along with improvements to the GPT-5.2-Codex harness.

title: Team Plan Access and Cowork Expansion
description: Claude Code access added to Team plan Standard seats, and Cowork research preview expanded to Pro plans. Opus 4 and 4.1 were deprecated.

title: New Diff View Feature
description: Claude AI announced a new diff view feature for Claude Code on both web and desktop platforms, allowing users to see exact changes Claude made without leaving the app.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code generates entire stacks. Building went from $50K and 6 months to $500 and 6 hours. Incredible. Genuinely world-changing.
Claude Code is an unreliable piece of software and yet one of the better ones in LLM-Coding.

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Support with Four Reasoning Efforts
description: Windsurf added support for GPT-5.2-Codex with four reasoning efforts (low, medium, high, and xhigh), designed for agentic coding in large codebases over long sessions.

title: GPT-5.2-Codex General Availability
description: GPT-5.2-Codex became generally available across Copilot Enterprise, Business, Pro, and Pro+ tiers. Built specifically for real-world software engineering and production workflows.

title: Version 0.24.0 with Agent Skills and Enhanced Security
description: Google released Gemini CLI v0.24.0 featuring Agent Skills, improved UI/UX, and enhanced security core improvements.
